Webinar: Managing The Big 4 of Mobile Testing
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
The first step in delivering quality mobile applications is finding a way to efficiently manage the Big 4 of mobile testing: devices, apps, security, and automation.
In this Webinar, Tricentis, Mobile Labs and special guest, voke Founder and Analyst, Theresa Lanowitz, will share strategies to manage the Big 4 of mobile testing. Specifically, we will discuss how you can:
- Identify, manage and optimize the level of quality risk in your mobile environment - Leverage a private mobile device cloud to remotely view and interact with mobile devices and apps for manual and automated mobile testing - Determine how and why to automate your mobile testing
"There's very little tolerance for a mobile application that does not work from a functional perspective as well as from a performance perspective." Says voke founder and analyst Theresa Lanowitz.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
